      • initialise

        public int initialise(int now,
                      int node_id,
                      Node mynode,
                      java.lang.String[] args)
        Description copied from interface: ApplicationAlgorithm
        Initializes the application algorithm and returns the required app_clock_tick_period. If app_clock_tick_period == 0, no clock_ticks will be submitted.
        Specified by:
        initialise in interface ApplicationAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value, always 0 during initialization
        node_id - this node id
        mynode - a reference to the node object executing this algorithm
        args - the arguments of the application algorithm
        Returns:
        the requested clock_tick_period

      • on_clock_tick

        Description copied from interface: ApplicationAlgorithm
        A periodic clock interrupt.
        Specified by:
        on_clock_tick in interface ApplicationAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        now - the current virtual clock value
